REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires certain members of the city of Syracuse police force to be residents of such city
Summary: Requires certain members of the city of Syracuse police force to be residents of such city.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring certain members of the city of Syracuse police force to be residents of such city
